name: Rocketbox
description: Rocketbox is an oscilloscope-themed robot who is a proud member of the WebtrES club. With its classic soldier design, it stands tall and commands attention. Its powerful rocket arms and legs make it incredibly agile and fast, allowing it to navigate even the toughest terrains with ease. Although its screen may be broken, it doesn't hinder Rocketbox's ability to analyze and interpret complex data streams. With its remarkable abilities and dedication to the WebtrES club, Rocketbox is always ready to assist and support its fellow members.
